QuestData.Title: Ysondre's Call
QuestData.Description: A dragon of the emerald dream... what have you gotten yourself involved in, $n?$B$BI wouldn't keep her waiting if I were you. The place she spoke of is what we call the Emerald Summit. A path off the main road through the Lower Wilds leads up one of the high stone plateaus; there's a small shrine at the top.$B$BGood luck, $n. I hope to see you back safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ysondre atop the Emerald Summit in the Lower Wilds.
QuestData.RewardText: You've come.$B$BI am ashamed to ask this of you, $c, but I've ran from him long enough. Taerar must be stopped.
